title: New Kayne skin? Christmas Candy Kayne??
body:
Since Kayne is a pretty popular Champion, why on earth does he only have ONE other skin since his release? 

My friend and me are talking how when ever we say “kayne” we think of the candy cane we have on Christmast. So we thought, why not give Kayne a Christmast skin called candy Kayne?? Instead of his scythe, he can TOTALLYY hold a candy cane instead? And his raast form can be Santa cuz his red (holding a candy cane) and his Kayne form can be something like an elf or something? 

We think this idea is PERFECT for Kayne since his name is literally “cane” and he should definitely deserve this skin!

AM AYE RITEEEE???

replies.body: As far as I recall Kayne doesn't exist in the game, Kayn however. {{champion:141}}
I don't even play kayne and I want this.

I don't agree with the forms,but we need this.Candy cane as a scythe.You see,I personnaly  think Krampus would be a better Rhaast.And then Kayn could be santa.I prefer this,but we need a candy cane skin for Kayn.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=pmLWoUOU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-12T00:50:09.940+0000)
>
> I don't even play kayne and I want this.

Agreed
